thread.title: Spokeswoman for Lamar Odom's aunt says he woke up and spoke
thread.title_full: Spokeswoman for Lamar Odom's aunt says he woke up and spoke

title: Spokeswoman for Lamar Odom's aunt says he woke up and spoke
text: > Top News Spokeswoman for Lamar Odom's aunt says he woke up and spoke FILE - In this March 2, 2008, file photo, Los Angeles Lakers forward Lamar Odom reacts to a call during the second half of their NBA basketball game against the Dallas Mavericks, in Los Angeles. Odom spent most of his 14-year NBA career in Los Angeles with the Lakers and Clippers, becoming a fan favorite before he sought even more fame with the Kardashians. Odom, who was embraced by teammates and television fans alike for his Everyman approach to fame, was found face-down and alone Tuesday, Oct. 13, 2015, after spending four days at the Love Ranch, a legal Nevada brothel.(AP Photo/Mark J. Terrill, File)
